The use of misleading and false captions: which falsely claimed that the elderly women in the images were studying in JNU and were arrested for protesting fee hike.
The discovery of the original source of: which revealed that the images were unrelated to the JNU students' protest. One image was from a protest demanding for minimum wage in Hyderabad, while the other was from a protest led by women's rights activists and lawyers outside the Supreme Court.
The identification of the woman in one o: a CPI leader, through previous fact-checking conducted by Alt News.
The previous debunking of similar miside: which aimed to discredit their protest against the fee hike.
